title: Kane Ga Nai Nara Daite Miro
alternative_title: Kane ga nainara daitemiro; 金がないなら抱いてみろ
status: Kane ga nainara daitemiro; 金がないなら抱いてみろ
description:
Description :
        Nishitani, in exchange for his girlfriend's debt, was beaten and forcibly taken away by a debt collector who burst into the woman's room and dragged him away. He awoke in the debt collector's room. "Hold me," the collector said, as a condition for paying off his debt, but he was unable to get an erection. And so began his life under the man with a scar on his face, whom he did not even know by name+
